sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: patch -Np1 -i ../fam-dnotify.patch : This patch causes fam to use the Linux kernel dnotify mechanism to inform the calling process of file modifications, rather than polling the file system for.
patch -Np1 -i ../fam-gcc3.patch : This patch is necessary to get fam to compile with gcc-3.2.
